programmes.show_description: Ticket To Murder. In Dalton, Georgia, a convenience store employee is stabbed at work. Security footage reveals a disturbing revelation about the killer's identity. S8, Ep15
Levi Bellfield. Levi Bellfield denied his connection to a series of murders and rapes, but videotaped police interviews tell a different story. Experts spot the giveaway signs. S3, Ep1
Chris Parker. Experts analyse a man's deception following the Manchester Arena terror attack. Police tapes expose a man who murdered his wife and hid her body in the freezer. S3, Ep2
Hellfire In The Hollow. When a 21-year-old mother doesn't return from night classes and her car is found burned, foul play is suspected. The web of lies that unfolds is shocking. S5, Ep4
Dangerous Case. In the late '70s, a terrorist group is suspected of setting off bombs in major US cities. Their goal: to bring attention to the Puerto Rican independence movement. S7, Ep2

A Fresh Start. Animal Cops discover a Doberman in an alarming state; its claws are so long they've grown into the pads of its feet. The dog is rescued but can its leg be saved? S12, Ep3
Traces of Guilt. Discover how a few milligrams of forensic evidence can be crucial to a crime investigation and prove the innocence or guilt of the accused. S3, Ep1
Lethal Obsessions. Exploring the mind of the obsessive murderer, following the work of psychologists as they study the muddled workings of the criminal psyche. S3, Ep2
Stolen Identity. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep12
Robin the Hood. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep13
Levi Bellfield. Levi Bellfield is a serial killer responsible for the horrific murders of three young women. His ex-partner reveals how his crimes have affected her. S1, Ep4
Texas Rangers. Examines the history and modern evolution of the Texas Rangers, who were formed in the 1830s to protect settlers against attacks from natives. S3, Ep11
Bad Medicine. A thought-provoking look at how drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. S3, Ep12
Unlikely Sources. How baffling crimes have been solved through evidence provided by insects, beer bottles and other seemingly meaningless objects. S3, Ep13
Defenseless. When Peggy Perez-Olivo is shot in the head her husband Carlos insists they were victims of carjackers. The horror that follows will shock even experienced investigators. S5, Ep4
Prescription For Murder. Wisconsin police are shocked to find an elderly couple brutally murdered in their home. When family start receiving death threats, will murder strike again? S3, Ep13
Murder By The Book. A couple is shot in their own home but husband Dan Montecalvo survives. The investigation reveals a scheming killer who almost got away with the perfect murder. S3, Ep11
Body In The Glades. 42-year-old Miami mum Raquel Calderin vanishes without a trace on her way home from work. The investigation leads detectives into a disturbing family picture. S4, Ep2
Disappearing Act. Real estate developer Jana Koklich vanishes and police suspect her job led her into danger, until a local pastor comes forward with a shocking confession. S3, Ep12
Whidbey Island Mystery. When Russel Douglas is found shot in the head in his car on a deserted road, it sparks a decade long case that leaves many with unanswered questions. S5, Ep6
We All Go A Little Mad. Police find a family dead, a horror film still playing, a bloody mask nearby - and a letter addressed to the woman who voiced 'The Exorcist' demon. S1, Ep3
Patrol. As cameras follow the work of patrol officers, they must navigate the chaos of a high-stakes series of shootings, high-speed chases and standoffs. S1, Ep7
Fred Talbot. When arrested for historic sexual offences, TV weatherman Fred Talbot tried to hide the truth in police interviews. His repeated response of 'no comment' speaks volumes. S3, Ep3
Comply Or Die. In North Carolina, a convenience store worker is killed, part of a pattern of armed robberies. Police race to arrest the robber before he kills again. S8, Ep17
Harold Shipman. Harold Shipman was a much-loved doctor. Millions watched the GP speaking on TV discussing the benefits of care, not knowing he'd already killed dozens of patients. S3, Ep4
The Dangers Of Success. As a prominent family awakens to noises in the night, their worst nightmare ensues when their beloved daughter, Terri Ann McCoy is fatally shot. S5, Ep5
The Great Philby Mob War. Three armed men attack a man and flee the scene. Authorities are unable to identify the assailants but are convinced it was the work of the Mafia. S7, Ep3

Zeus' Battle For Survival. It's touch and go for German shepherd Zeus as the Animal Cops medical team work through the night to remove a collar embedded in his neck. S12, Ep4
Lasting Impressions. No matter how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit often leaves something behind. Even a fingerprint or shoe tread can lead to a conviction. S3, Ep3
Dead Wrong. Hiding a body can be tricky - it's sometimes easier to obscure the circumstances of death, turning murder into suicide or blaming it on someone else. S3, Ep4
A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep14
Bad Company. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep15
Bachan Kaur Athwal. In 1998, Bachan Kaur Athwal ordered her daughter-in-law to be strangled to death in an 'honour killing'. The victim's family reveal how her murder affected them. S1, Ep5
Deadly Heist. When an employee at an armoured van company receives a call about a money shipment that did not arrive, an FBI search for the missing van begins. S4, Ep6
Death in the Delta. Shannon Sanderson was abducted after a successful night at the casino and police discovered she had been stalked and attacked for her $5,000 winnings. S4, Ep9
The Price of Greed. Follows the FBI investigation into a robbery in which masked gunmen tied up employees at an armoured truck depot and left with $18.9 million. S5, Ep1

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: We Found Bonnie. A family is torn apart when a mother in Florida goes missing. The case stumps detectives, who believe that only the woman's three-year-old son knows the truth. S1, Ep5

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: No Promise For Tomorrow. A landlord approaches his rental home to inspect a broken window when he hears a baby crying. What he finds inside will haunt two families forever. S2, Ep1

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: In 2005, a woman is reported missing when she fails to show up at a Motley Crue concert. To this day, her friends and family wait for her killer to visit her secret grave. S2, Ep4

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: A Double Life. In rural Missouri, the body of a young woman lies dead on a deserted dirt road only days before her wedding. Police uncover surprising secrets in her fiancé's life. S2, Ep2

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: The Lookout. The brutal murders of two teenage girls at a remote lookout point at first seem random. Police uncover a web of secrets among their network of friends. S2, Ep5

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: Free To Kill Again. When Erika Verdecia goes missing, her family launches their own search for her. What their homegrown investigation uncovers is a tragic trail of bloodshed. S2, Ep12
Steven McDowell. In Baytown, Texas, 37-year-old Crystal McDowell disappears without a trace. Can detectives uncover the mistake that gives her killer away? S5, Ep7
They All Saw His Evil. A divorcée starts a relationship with a seemingly kind father. However, she doesn't see what everyone else sees in her new man - that he is a killer. S10, Ep18
